A modular, enterprise-grade Java Spring Boot admin framework.
Built for scalability, performance, and developer experience.
language-java shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter material-theme material-theme-palenight
Why choose Tagtag for your next enterprise application?
Strictly layered design with common, framework, kernel, contract, and module. Decoupled and maintainable.
Built-in RBAC (Role-Based Access Control), Data Permission, Operation Logs, and Rate Limiting.
Clear separation of API definitions and implementations using DTOs and Interfaces.
Built on Spring Boot 3, MyBatis Plus, and Redis, integrated with modern Vue 3 admin frontends.
Ready-to-use modules for OSS (Aliyun), Message Queues (RabbitMQ), and Third-party Auth (WeChat, GitHub).
Standardized error handling, response wrapping, and utility libraries to speed up development.
Get started with Tagtag today and build robust enterprise applications.
Ready to build your admin system?
